text: Mont-Saint-Hilaire station is a commuter rail station operated by Exo in Mont- Saint-Hilaire, Quebec, Canada. It is the eastern terminus of the Mont-Saint- Hilaire line. == Connecting bus routes == === CIT de la Vallée du Richelieu === {| class="wikitable" !style="background: #; font-size:100%; color:#FFFFFF;" colspan="4"|CIT de la Vallée du Richelieu |- !
